title: [管理|安全|汉化]Keys——sponge的锁插件[1.8.9]
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1582952890 于 2017-9-16 20:10 编辑 

额，其实也就是最近在搞sponge服，所以自己汉化了几个插件也就顺带分享出来吧
插件说明
 
    sponge的锁插件，能实现自动上锁和手段上锁，共享锁权限等功能，总的来说相比LWC功能没那么强大，但总比没有好




 

插件命令及用法
 
/lock                -上锁
/unlock            -解锁
/keys add (user)                 -给玩家某个锁的访问权
/keys del (user)                  -去除玩家访问权复制代码输入指令完之后左键点一下目标
其中有些方块是自动上锁的，有的支持手动上，这些在配置文件里配置。其他的就是没法锁的。和lwc有点相似，但lwc可以用木牌强制上锁，这插件应该不行













 
权限
 
keys.use    -普通使用权。给用户这个就好
keys.mod       -完全控制权。给管理员的复制代码


 
配置文件
 
\config\keys\keys.conf
autolock {        //自动上锁的方块id
    blocks=[
        "minecraft:acacia_door",
        "minecraft:acacia_fence_gate",
        "minecraft:anvil",
        "minecraft:beacon",
        "minecraft:birch_door",
        "minecraft:birch_fence_gate",
        "minecraft:brewing_stand",
        "minecraft:chest",
        "minecraft:command_block",
        "minecraft:dark_oak_door",
        "minecraft:dark_oak_fence_gate",
        "minecraft:dispenser",
        "minecraft:dropper",
        "minecraft:enchanting_table",
        "minecraft:fence_gate",
        "minecraft:furnace",
        "minecraft:heavy_weighted_pressure_plate",
        "minecraft:hopper",
        "minecraft:iron_door",
        "minecraft:iron_trapdoor",
        "minecraft:jukebox",
        "minecraft:jungle_door",
        "minecraft:jungle_fence_gate",
        "minecraft:lever",
        "minecraft:light_weighted_pressure_plate",
        "minecraft:lit_furnace",
        "minecraft:spruce_door",
        "minecraft:spruce_fence_gate",
        "minecraft:standing_sign",
        "minecraft:stone_button",
        "minecraft:stone_pressure_plate",
        "minecraft:trapdoor",
        "minecraft:trapped_chest",
        "minecraft:wall_banner",
        "minecraft:wall_sign",
        "minecraft:wooden_button",
        "minecraft:wooden_door",
        "minecraft:wooden_pressure_plate"
    ]
}
lockable {                                           //支持手动锁的方块id
    blocks=[
        "minecraft:acacia_door",
        "minecraft:acacia_fence_gate",
        "minecraft:anvil",
        "minecraft:beacon",
        "minecraft:birch_door",
